scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=studio
scripts.check-deps: npm ls 2>&1 | grep -i 'peer dep\|UNMET' || echo 'All peer deps satisfied'
scripts.check-deps:root: npm ls 2>&1 | grep -i 'peer dep\|UNMET' || echo 'All peer deps satisfied'
scripts.typegen: cd studio && npx sanity schema extract --path=../frontend/sanity/extract.json && npx sanity typegen generate --config-path=../frontend/sanity-typegen.json
